name: Tax Incentivised Savings Association
memberOrga: The full list of TISA members is available at http://www.tisa.uk.com/list_of_members.html
goal: TISA is a not-for-profit membership association operating within the UK financial services industry involved in helping members by providing technical support on dealing with legislative or regulatory changes to the rules on supply and distribution of savings and investment products and services and policy support to help improve future services for consumers and the industry.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Information Society, Taxation
euInitiatives: we are interested in areas related to Capital Market Union, the Digital Single Economy and Financial Services generally especially where the EU commissions areas of interest overlap with our  UK centric proposals to promote UK saving
